title: Baby Registry - Little miracle on the way!
heading: A little miracle is coming to Céline & Paola!
subheading: Expected August 2025, our little wonder is getting ready to make their grand entrance 👶✨

giftList.title: Gift Registry
giftList.description: Choose a gift to welcome our future little explorer

donation.title: Baby Fund
donation.description: The big moving day is here! 📦 Our little squatter is finally leaving mom's fully-equipped studio (central heating, 24/7 room service, and all-inclusive placenta comfort!). We're setting up a fund to help them get equipped in their new world... where strangely, nothing is free! Thanks for contributing to this new adventure! 🍼👶
